entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
